title: Stylish Central Shanghai Pullman Stay with Onsite Dining, Pool & Spa
description:
Experience vibrant Shanghai from a luxurious base in the heart of the city. This hotel is perfectly positioned within the bustling Jing'an District, within easy reach of the city's renowned shopping, dining and cultural attractions. From the glittering lights of Nanjing Road to the historic charm of Jing'an Temple, the best of Shanghai is at your fingertips.

The hotel itself is a haven of comfort and sophistication, offering spacious rooms with modern amenities and stunning city views. After a day of exploring, return to the hotel for a refreshing dip in the pool or a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. For dining, the hotel's two venues serve a tantalising array of international and local cuisine.
offer_address: 330 Meiyuan Road, Jingan District, Shanghai, China, 200070
